title: Army, Marine generals on Afghanistan evacuation: 'I’ve never seen anything like it'
content:
1. Army, Marine generals on Afghanistan evacuation: 'I’ve never seen anything like it'  ABC News
  2. These Are The Military's Options For Extending Evacuations In Afghanistan. None Of Them Are Good.  The Drive
  3. How one activist was smuggled out of Afghanistan: ‘There were dozens of Taliban checkpoints’  The France 24 Observers
  4. US troops can't escort Afghans to Kabul airport  AP Archive
  5. The US State Department says it has contacted every American who expressed interest in leaving Afghanistan  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
